name: .PDPCMD File Extension
summary: Learn about .PDPCMD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Command file created and used by Pdplayer, a professional image sequence player; contains a set of commands in plain text that is executed by the application to set up a composition.

content: The commands in the PDPCMD file are executed by Pdplayer similarly to how Excel uses macros. The file is handy for automating common tasks to save time.

The PDPCMD file can also be used to export your composition instead of using the proprietary .PDPCOMP file. Since the PDPCMD file is stored in plain text, it can be easily read for importing into an unsupported third party applications.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
